intermediateFlows.statement: public void login(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Model model) throws IOException {
intermediateFlows.methodName: public void login(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Model model)

findings.description:
The user can send a userName over a request parameter. This userName will be added in the model, later this model will be sent in the response body through the append method call, therefore XSS attack exist.

Curl:
curl http://localhost:8080/login?userName=%3Cscript%3E%20%20%20alert(%22Yourcookie%3D%22%20%2B%20document.cookie)%20%20%20%20%3C%2Fscript%3E

source.methodName: public void login(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Model model)

sink.methodName: public void login(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Model model)

findings.description:
The user can send a user id over a request parameter. This userName will be sent in the response through append method call, therefore Reflexive XSS attack exist.

Curl:
curl http://localhost:8080/login?userName=%3Cscript%3E%20%20%20alert(%22Yourcookie%3D%22%20%2B%20document.cookie)%20%20%20%20%3C%2Fscript%3E
